issue.title: Sphincs Haraka through shake 256 not working
issue.body: Hello, I was trying to generate certs with Sphinics on Harka, SHA 256, and shake 256 but I have only gotten "sphincsharaka128frobust" working. I use the same notation as on the Github page ex"sphincssha256128srobust". An I using the notation wrong or is there some other problem?

comment.body:
Hello, thanks for your reply. I followed the steps on the website and got the algorithms to generate the keys but I am still facing a couple of issues. The first issue is that "rainbowVccylic" still does not work and the second issue is that I am not able to get the certificate signing requests for a lot of the algorithms. I use the commands provided in the openssl website " apps/openssl req -new -newkey <SIG> -keyout <SIG>_srv.key -out <SIG>_srv.csr -nodes -subj "/CN=oqstest server" -config apps/openssl.cnf
" and " apps/openssl x509 -req -in <SIG>_srv.csr -out <SIG>_srv.crt -CA <SIG>_CA.crt -CAkey <SIG>_CA.key -CAcreateserial -days 365" and I get this response. 

140584294539584:error:0D078079:asn1 encoding routines:asn1_item_embed_d2i:field missing:crypto/asn1/tasn_dec.c:406:Field=algorithm, Type=X509_ALGOR
140584294539584:error:0D08303A:asn1 encoding routines:asn1_template_noexp_d2i:nested asn1 error:crypto/asn1/tasn_dec.c:627:Field=algor, Type=X509_PUBKEY
140584294539584:error:0D08303A:asn1 encoding routines:asn1_template_noexp_d2i:nested asn1 error:crypto/asn1/tasn_dec.c:627:Field=pubkey, Type=X509_REQ_INFO
140584294539584:error:0D08303A:asn1 encoding routines:asn1_template_noexp_d2i:nested asn1 error:crypto/asn1/tasn_dec.c:627:Field=req_info, Type=X509_REQ
140584294539584:error:0906700D:PEM routines:PEM_ASN1_read_bio:ASN1 lib:crypto/pem/pem_oth.c:33:
